#!/bin/ksh

export CXX="xlC_r"
export CXXFLAGS=$CFLAGS
export LDFLAGS="-L/tmp/apachetest/dev/lib -L/opt/freeware/lib64 -L/opt/freeware/lib \
-Wl,-bmaxdata:0x80000000 -Wl,-bh:4 -Wl,-b64 -Wl,-bexpall -Wl,-bnolibpath"

     --prefix=/tmp/apachetest/apr \
     --exec-prefix=/tmp/apachetest/apr \
     --with-apr=/tmp/apachetest/apr \
     --with-crypto \
     --with-openssl=/tmp/apachetest/dev \
     --with-ldap=/tmp/apachetest/dev \
     --with-ldap-lib=/tmp/apachetest/dev/lib \
